text:
How about inside fields.json? It seems sometimes it's works and other times the src comes back as unknown. I've even had it work and then after saving again it stops working. : /

`"src": "{{ get_asset_url('../images/image.png') }}"`

<@U39DT5YFL> Our theme heavily leverages get_asset_url as you have done in your snippet above in fields.json to set defaults and I don’t think I’ve had any issues with it. The only annoying thing is that no photo preview is shown in the module pane on the left side of the page editor. But they always render fine and are being referenced correctly in the code.

Hm maybe it's just some weird one-off issue on my end. It doesn't happen too often so not too big a problem; just annoying lol. I had a thumbnail slider that was rendering the image in the main slider just fine and then the thumbnail portion was getting back 'unknown' and then an hour later it was working just fine.
